Name: Olaf Dietsche
AboutMe:
I am a professional software developer, working as a freelancer since 1987. My primary programming languages comprise C++, Java, SQL and various scripting languages (shell, Perl, Python, AWK, ...).

My skills also include both front end (HTML, CSS, Javascript, jQuery) and back end web development (PHP, JSP, Java servlets).
